parameters.name: NumCThread
parameters.description: Total number of cosmetic threads on the drawing view

title: IView.IGetCThreads
description: Gets all of the cosmetic threads on this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumCThread
parameters.description: Total number of cosmetic threads on the drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of cosmetic threads VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of cosmetic threads all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstCThread
and then repeatedly calling
ICThread::GetNext
to obtain the remaining cosmetic threads on the drawing view.
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetCThreadCount
to get the value for numCThread.
